name: Ecommerce Coupons & Promotions UI Kit
description:
Looking for ready designs for the best discount coupons & promotions experience in your ecommerce store? Check out our 100% customizable UI kit with ready-to-use components based on the best practices for usability. Ensure best-in-class promotion discovery, application, and validation experience, accelerating development time and saving time and money in the long run. 


The UI Kit includes:


  • Editable Components Library
  • Sales Page
  • My Coupons Page
  • Coupon Input Fields
  • Checkout Views
  • Cart Views


Voucherify is an API-first Promotion Engine that allows marketers to run, share, and track personalized promotions, such as coupon offers, gift cards, referral, and loyalty programs like e-commerce giants do, but at a fraction of the cost.


Components are based on the best practices of coupon & automatic discount campaigns that are collected in our UX & UI Guide. 


If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at marketing@voucherify.io
